ðŸ“– Summary: AnduinOS is a custom Ubuntu-based Linux distribution designed to ease the transition for developers moving from Windows to Linux. It achieves this by maintaining familiar operational habits and workflows. The distribution aims to provide a comfortable and efficient development environment for those accustomed to Windows.
